mapper.select: SELECT newCustomerCount.newCustomer AS newCustomer, totalCustomerCount.totalCustomer AS totalCustomer, newOrderNumCount.newOrderNum AS newOrderNum, totalOrderNumCount.totalOrderNum AS totalOrderNum, newSaleAmountCount.newSaleAmount AS newSaleAmount, totalSaleAmountCount.totalSaleAmount AS totalSaleAmount FROM ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS newCustomer FROM t_customer WHERE DATE_FORMAT(wechat_subscribe_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newCustomerCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS totalCustomer FROM t_customer ) totalCustomerCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT toi.order_item_id) AS newOrderNum FROM t_order_item toi, t_order tord WHERE tord.is_payed = 1 AND tord.order_id = toi.order_id AND DATE_FORMAT(toi.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newOrderNumCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT toi.order_item_id) AS totalOrderNum FROM t_order_item toi, t_order tord WHERE tord.is_payed = 1 AND tord.order_id = toi.order_id ) totalOrderNumCount, ( SELECT sum(IFNULL(amount, 0)) AS newSaleAmount FROM t_order WHERE is_payed = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newSaleAmountCount, ( SELECT sum(IFNULL(amount, 0)) AS totalSaleAmount FROM t_order WHERE is_payed = 1 ) totalSaleAmountCount

SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS registerCustomerNum, DATE_FORMAT(wechat_subscribe_time, #{dateFormat}) AS registerCustomerTime FROM t_customer WHERE DATE_FORMAT(wechat_subscribe_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY registerCustomerTime

SELECT count(DISTINCT toi.order_item_id) AS orderNum, DATE_FORMAT(toi.create_time, #{dateFormat}) AS orderCreateTime FROM t_order_item toi, t_order tord WHERE tord.is_payed = 1 AND tord.order_id = toi.order_id AND DATE_FORMAT(toi.create_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY orderCreateTime

SELECT sum(IFNULL(amount, 0)) AS saleAmount, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) AS saleTime FROM t_order WHERE is_payed = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY saleTime
